reasoning: CHARGE syndrome (CHD7 mutations) is a rare genetic disorder affecting craniofacial, cardiac, ocular, and auditory development. Birth incidence estimated at 1 per 8,500-10,000 live births, approximately 1.0-1.2 per 100k. Data from genetic registries and case studies.
source: Lalani SR et al. (2006). CHARGE syndrome: the phenotypic spectrum of mutations in CHD7. J Med Genet. 43(4):306-314
